text: Flash Gordon is a 1980 album by English rock band Queen. It is the soundtrack album to the science fiction movie Flash Gordon. == Track listing == #Flash's Theme #In the Space Capsule #Ming's Theme #The Ring #Football Fight #In the Death Cell #Execution of Flash #The Kiss #Arboria #Escape from the Swamp #Flash to the Rescue #Vultan's Theme #Battle Theme #The Wedding March #Marriage of Dale And Ming #Crash Dive on Mingo City #Flash's Theme Reprise #The Hero Category:Queen (band) albums Category:1980 albums Category:Rock albums Category:Flash Gordon Category:Elektra Records albums
title: Flash Gordon (album)
